trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects.

A BuildItemGroup object can represent an element in the project, or a virtual collection of items, containing the items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element.
trans-unit.target: BuildItemGroup 개체를 프로젝트에 있는 요소를 나타낼 수 있거나 항목을 포함 하는 항목의 가상 컬렉션에서 와일드 카드를 확인 한 후 만든는 `Include` 및 `Exclude` 의 특성은 `Item` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> class.

Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property values to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 추가 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> 지정 된 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 속성 값을 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.

Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property values to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>, allowing you to specify whether the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property value is treated as a literal.
trans-unit.target: 새로운를 추가 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> 지정 된 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 속성 값을 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"> </xref>를 지정할 수 있도록 허용 여부는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*>속성 값이 리터럴로 처리 됩니다.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `itemInclude` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>처리 하는 `itemInclude` 매개 변수를 리터럴 값으로, 그러지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.

Removes the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup.Condition*> property value and all <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> references the same property group as the original.
trans-unit.target: 단순 복사본을 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>원본과 동일한 속성 그룹을 참조 합니다.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>

trans-unit.source: Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
trans-unit.target: 수정 내용을 단순 복사본을 두 복사본에 반영 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> can be independently modified.
trans-unit.target: 전체 복사본을 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>의 복사본을 둘 다 있도록 참조 하는 새 XML 요소를 만듭니다는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>독립적으로 수정할 수 없습니다.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> </xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of items created after evaluating wildcards in the `Include` and `Exclude` attributes of an `Item` element), only deep copies are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>는 프로젝트의 요소에 직접적으로 해당 (에서 와일드 카드를 확인 한 후 만든 항목의 컬렉션에 해당 하는 대신는 `Include` 및 `Exclude` 의 특성은 `Item` 요소) 전체 복사본만 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create a deep copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>전체 복사본을 만들려면는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"> </xref>고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the item group.
The `Condition` attribute value of the item group.
Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 호출자가 사용할 수는 `foreach` C# 언어의 (`for each` 에서 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 개별 <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup> 개체</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem> 를 반복 하려면

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item group was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: 프로젝트에 항목 그룹을 가져왔는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item group was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>항목 그룹; 프로젝트로 가져올 하지 못한 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 0부터 시작 인덱스는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> 개체를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
Removes the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> to remove.
Removes the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> at the specified index from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> object to remove.
Copies the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref> to a new array.
A new array containing the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> objects copied from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 포함 하는 새 배열은 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> 에서 복사 된 개체는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItemGroup"> </xref>합니다.
